          <title>
            <string language="en">Metals conduct heat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metallführung Hitze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La chaleur de conduite en métal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calor da conduta dos metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calore di comportamento dei metalli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμότητα συμπεριφοράς μετάλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calor de la conducta de los metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a pot made of aluminium. Aluminium metals are good heat conductors.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aluminium</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Conductor</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Pot</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Topf, der vom 
Aluminium gebildet wird. Aluminiummetalle sind gute Hitzeleiter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un pot fait 
d'aluminium. Les métaux d'aluminium sont de bons conducteurs de
la chaleur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um potenciômetro feito 
do alumínio. Os metais do alumínio são condutores bons do 
calor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un POT fatto di 
alluminio. I metalli dell'alluminio sono buoni conduttori di 
calore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα δοχείο φιαγμένο από
αλουμίνιο. Τα μέταλλα αλουμινίου είναι καλοί αγωγοί 
θερμότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un crisol hecho del 
aluminio. Los metales del aluminio son buenos conductores del 
calor.</string>
          </description>
